# audioset experiments

## Download pretrained models
```
cd audioset/
./models.sh
```

## Test audioset experiments
Test if `VGGish` and `YamNet` are ready to run.
```
python src/audioset/vggish/vggish_smoke_test.py 
python src/audioset/yamnet/yamnet_test.py
```

## Run audioset VGGish experiments
```
python vggish_inference_demo.py ../data/sample.wav

```

## Run audioset YamNet experiments
```
python inference.py ../data/sample.wav
../data/sample.wav :
  Speech      : 0.814
  Music       : 0.122
  Speech synthesizer: 0.022
  Narration, monologue: 0.013
  Musical instrument: 0.004
```
